mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter from South Carolina: Mills House, Charleston, S.C., January 27th, 1868
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: E. H.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Signed, in print, at end: E.H.

Text begins: Dear Major: I left home on the 20th inst. for a trip of a few weeks through the Southern States to look into the financial condition of things, and incidentally to examine into the social and political status of society as I went along. Arriving in Washington the same evening ... "
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Tracy W. McGregor Library, American History Collection. McGregor Endowment Fund, 2010/2011.
